name: JK Place Firenze

reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at JK Place in March 2005 for two nights to celebrate my 50th birthday.
reviews.title: Highly recommended
Tasteful boutique hotel
reviews.text: We wanted somewhere special and liked the earlier reviews for this hotel on TripAdvisor. We went with high hopes for a special break, JK Place exceeded our expectations. The rooms and general areas were wonderfully designed, the staff were faultless, nothing was too much trouble.

reviews.title: Best Hotel in Florence
reviews.text: Breakfast was either in your room or at the large table in the breakfast room, snacks and many drinks are complimentary all day. We took the recommendation of the reception staff who booked us into an excellent local restaurant for the first evening, then at the adjoining JK Lounge on the second night for an excellent meal.

reviews.title: Loved It!
reviews.text: Recommended without hesitation for anyone looking for a top quality, stylish hotel. Certainly by some way the best hotel we have ever stayed at.

reviews.title: Hotel JK Place was a first class experience in every way!
reviews.text: My travel companion and I just returned from Italy, with three nights having been spent in Florence. Due to my companion's business being in the travel industry, we decided to engage in site inspections of various hotels, and stay at a different hotel for each of the three nights in Florence - one of those nights being at the JK Place.

reviews.title: True luxury without ATTITUDE
reviews.text: Based on the reviews on Trip Advisor, I booked five nights at JK Place for a "girls trip". Everyone at JK Place took excellant care of us. The concierge service was outstanding with our touring arrangements and reservations for museums and dinner. The house breakfast buffet and cappuccinos are great. JK Place is a must if you are visiting the beautiful city of Florence.

There are not enough positive adjectives to describe the JK. It's a wonderful, intimate escape. This boutique hotel has 5-star ammenities. From the comfortable sitting rooms to the top-notch staff, this hotel is a must for anyone staying in Florence.
reviews.title: Home Away from Home
Fantastic staff and very stylish.
reviews.text: I took my mother to JK Place for two nights for her 60th birthday present. I had let the hotel know this in advance, and they upgraded us to a Junior Suite on arrival. The rooms were beautiful - very stylish and perfectly maintained. The staff were absolutely charming throughout - they really couldn't have been any nicer or more helpful. The common parts of the hotel are equally chic and the breakfast just right (although not huge). I can't recommend the hotel highly enough. My only criticisms are that the Piazza S M Novella is the scruffiest in Florence and that the hotel is quite expensive - however you get what you pay for!

I recently stayed at JK Place for four nights. I had a classic room and my parents had a superior room which was slightly bigger. We orginally were planning to stay at the another hotel until I came upon the reviews on tripadvisor. After checking out the website and sending countless emails to the hotel, we finally decided to try it out. Well, we were NOT disappointed. From the time we were fetched at the airport to the time we left, JK place made our Florence vacation memorable. We were pampered throughout our stay, and no request seemed impossible. Our restaurant reservations were taken care of, car arrangements for day trips to Sienna, and just about everything else we needed. I felt like royalty vacationing in one of my palaces. JK place does not feel like a hotel- it feels like a home- a luxurious one at that, with a staff ready to see to your every need without being intrusive. Breakfast, and the snacks served all day were absolutely divine. We loved relaxing in the tv room (super chic yet comfy) in the afternoons, drinking coffee and snacking on the home made tart of the day. I cannot say enough great things about this gorgeous place and the wonderful staff that made our stay enjoyable. The location is convenient- everything of importance was a ten minute walk at most. I would stay here again in a heartbeat. Special thanks to Sabrina and Angela who went out of their way to accomodate my requests. But really the entire staff was superb. I've stayed in many top hotels around the world, but JKPlace beats them hands down in service.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel
It's all true...
reviews.text: Just returned from our honeymoon, stayed for 2 nights. Read other reviews on this website and thought JK Place sounded too good to be true; this is not the case. As another traveller remarked in his or her review, it actually felt like I was staying at my rich uncle's house while he was away; and he instructed his entire staff to take great care of us. The accommodations are ultra-chic, but cozy; the common areas are absolutely gorgeous. It's the little things, like having access to complimentary potato chips, coffee and other munchies during the day or the fresh fruit in your room when you arrive, that really make you feel at home. A fantastic choice in Florence.

description: Comfort, sophistication, style and value right in the heart of Florence. J.K Place has carved out an exceptionally pleasant niche for itself, a niche that’s just seconds from the door of the stunning church of Santa Maria Novella. All the major sites are within easy walking distance. The rooms: Just twenty of them, snazzy, characterful, no two are alike, and all with signature soft furnishings in creams, granges and neutrals offset with contrasting piping in an effortlessly chic Anouska meets Ralph love-in. The glass covered courtyard and roof terrace beckon on warmer days whilst winter afternoons are best spent huddled by the fireplace in the J.K Lounge with a thick slice of cake and a steaming hot cioccolata con panna. Add very friendly, discreet service plus probably the city’s best Concierge and you are just asking for a good time!
